price: 1. Waxaa khayr iyo barako badan (Alle) ay Gacantiisu ku jirto Mulkiga (iyo Maamulka uunka oo dhan), wax walbana Kara.
arabic: تَبَٰرَكَ ٱلَّذِي بِيَدِهِ ٱلۡمُلۡكُ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٌ
footnotes: 1. Al-Mulk: Xukunka, Boqortooyada, Hanashada, Lahaanshada, Maamulka, Agaasinka, iwm.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: tabāraka alladhī biyadihi al-mul'ku wahuwa ʿalā kulli shayin qadīrun
